title: The means of access shall be normally governed by the provisions of Regulation No
clause_text: The means of access shall be normally governed by the provisions of Regulation No. 23 However, in the CDS, wherever the design of the buildings up to 32.0 m height requires relaxation in the width of access, the same may be given. However, high rise buildings shall be permissible as per Regulation No 19.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:
